mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO "ANIMAL" ("NO", "CATEGORY_NO", "DEPARTMENT_NO", "PROFILE", "NICK_NAME", "FEILD") VALUES (SEQ_ANIMAL_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_CATEGORY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{departmentNo}, #{profile}, #{nickName}, #{feild}) INTO "CATEGORY" ("CATEGORY_NO", "CLASSIFICATION_NO", "TASTE_NO", "HABITAT_NO", "ENDANGERED_RATING_NO", "NAME") VALUES (SEQ_CATEGORY_NO.NEXTVAL,#{animalClassificationNo},#{tasteNo},#{habitatNo},#{endangeredRatingNo},#{name}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT A.NO, A.NICK_NAME, TO_CHAR(A."DATE",'YYYY-MM-DD') AS"DATE", A.FEILD, C.NAME , T.TASTE, H.HABITAT, E.ENDANGERED FROM ANIMAL A JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO JOIN ANIMAL_CLASSIFICATION AC ON C.CLASSIFICATION_NO = AC.NO JOIN TASTE T ON C.TASTE_NO = T.TASTE_NO JOIN HABITAT H ON C.HABITAT_NO = H.HABITAT_NO JOIN ENDANGERED_RATING E ON C.ENDANGERED_RATING_NO = E.ENDANGERED_RATING_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'O'
AND ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY A.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM ANIMAL WHERE STATUS = 'O'
AND ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT A.NO, A.PROFILE, A.DEPARTMENT_NO, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, A.NICK_NAME, A.STATUS, TO_CHAR( A."DATE",'YYYY-MM-DD')AS "DATE", A.FEILD, C.CLASSIFICATION_NO, AC.NAME AS ANIMAL_CLASSIFICATION_NAME, T.TASTE_NO, H.HABITAT_NO, C.NAME AS NAME, E.ENDANGERED_RATING_NO, T.TASTE, H.HABITAT, E.ENDANGERED FROM ANIMAL A JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO JOIN ANIMAL_CLASSIFICATION AC ON C.CLASSIFICATION_NO = AC.NO JOIN TASTE T ON C.TASTE_NO = T.TASTE_NO JOIN HABITAT H ON C.HABITAT_NO = H.HABITAT_NO JOIN ENDANGERED_RATING E ON C.ENDANGERED_RATING_NO = E.ENDANGERED_RATING_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON A.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO WHERE A.NO =#{no}
SELECT NO ,ANIMAL_NO ,STATE_OF_HEALTH , TO_CHAR(CHECKUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKUP_DATE ,CONTENT ,DISEASE ,LIFE_STYLE_MANAGEMENT FROM ANIMAL_HEALTH_SCREENING WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT AT.TRAINING_NO ,AT.TITLE AS TRAINING_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(AT."DATE",'YYYY-DD-MM')AS TRAINING_DATE ,A.NICK_NAME AS NICK_NAME ,A.NO AS ANIMAL_NO FROM ANIMAL_TRAINING AT JOIN ANIMAL A ON AT.NO = A.NO WHERE AT.STATUS = 'O'
AND A.NICK_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY AT.TRAINING_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM ANIMAL_TRAINING WHERE STATUS = 'O'
SELECT TITLE AS TRAINING_TITLE , NO AS TRAINING_NO ,CONTENT AS TRAINING_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR("DATE" , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRAINING_DATE FROM ANIMAL_TRAINING WHERE TRAINING_NO= #{no} AND STATUS = 'O'

SELECT AHS.NO ,AHS.STATE_OF_HEALTH ,TO_CHAR(AHS.CHECKUP_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKUP_DATE ,A.NICK_NAME FROM ANIMAL_HEALTH_SCREENING AHS JOIN ANIMAL A ON AHS.ANIMAL_NO = A.NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'O'
AND A.NICK_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY AHS.NO DESC

UPDATE ANIMAL SET DEPARTMENT_NO= #{departmentNo} WHERE NO = #{animalNo}
